Class HospitalSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • HospitalSystem
  • public class HospitalSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Hospital System to manage Doctor and Patient classes within a Ward

        public void assignDoctorToPatient​(java.lang.String docName,
                                  int pntNumber)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Assigns a Doctor class a patient, and vice-versa
        Parameters:
        docName - - Name of Doctor class present in the instance
        pntNumber - - Number of Patient class present in the instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - When the assignment is already present

      • assignPatient

        public void assignPatient​(int pntNumber,
                          int bedLabel)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Assigns a Patient to a bed within the Ward
        Parameters:
        pntNumber - - Patient class health number
        bedLabel - - bedLabel index
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - when the specified bedLabel is already occupied or out of range

        public void dropAssociation​(java.lang.String docName,
                            int pntNumber)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Drops the association between a Doctor and Patient class
        Parameters:
        docName - - Name of Doctor class present in the instance
        pntNumber - - Number of Patient class present in the instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - when the association between classes is one-sided
